document_data.name: Hr'a'cknir Bracers
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Hr'a'cknir bracers''''' were a set of [[magic]]al bracers of [[githyanki]] origin. They channeled energy from the [[Astral Plane]] and offered numerous [[spell]]-like powers to their wearer.
document_data.Description: The bracers were crafted from "planar [[silver]]". They allowed the wearer to tap into "latent astral energies" that permeated [[the Weave]].
document_data.Powers: At will, the wearer of the ''Hr'a'cknir bracers'' could conjure a ''[[mage hand]]'' at pace much quicker than most spellcasters. Several times per day, they could also mentally ''[[Telekinesis|move, manipulate, or forcefully launch]]'' objects or people, up to a range of {{SI|60|ft}}.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Ch'r'ai [[Tska'an]], a gith warrior who traveled to the village of [[Reithwin]] on [[Toril]] in [[1492 DR]].
